data.name: Sample-Tenable-Security-Center-1.1.0
data.description: Tenable Security Center provide actions like get all completed scans, scan specific assets and asset specific vulnerabilities

workflows.name: List Asset Vulnerabilities
workflows.description: List vulnerabilities for an individual asset

workflows.name: > TenableSecurityCenter  > Fetch
workflows.description: This playbook fetch scans and associated assets

conditions.condition: {{ vars.scans_records is not none and (vars.scans_records | length) > 0 }}

arguments.last_x_days: {% if vars.steps.Get_Macro_Value.data['hydra:member'] | length > 0 %}{% if vars.request.env_setup %}{% if not vars.days or vars.days == '' %}Last 7 Days{% else %}{{ vars.days }}{% endif %}{% else %}{{vars.steps.Get_Macro_Value.data['hydra:member'][0]['value']}}{% endif %}{% else %}{% if not vars.days or vars.days == '' %}Last 7 Days{% else %}{{ vars.days }}{% endif %}{% endif %}

step_variables._configuration_schema:
[
    {
        "title": "Completion Time",
        "type": "select",
        "name": "days",
        "options": [
            "Last Fetch",
            "Last 24 Hours",
            "Last 3 Days",
            "Last 5 Days",
            "Last 7 Days",
            "Last 15 Days",
            "Last 25 Days",
            "Last 30 Days",
            "Last 50 Days",
            "Last 60 Days",
            "Last 90 Days",
            "Last 120 Days",
            "Last 180 Days"
        ],
        "required": true,
        "editable": true,
        "visible": true,
        "tooltip": "Fetch records from last X days. e.g 7",
        "value": "Last 7 Days"
    }
]

routes.name: Create or Update Scans -> Get Name ID Mapping
Get Assets Details -> Copy of Get Assets Details
Get Macro Value -> Set Time Configuration
Process Assets Records -> Copy of Process Assets Records
Records Returned -> Create or Update Scans
routes.label: yes

workflows.name: List Assets
workflows.description: List assets associated with particular scans

workflows.name: >> Create or Update Assets
workflows.description: Creates new assets and updates existing ones

resource.name: {{vars.item.netbiosName}}
resource.criticality: {% if vars.item.severityCritical|int == 0 %}{{"Criticality" | picklist("None", "@id")}}{%elif 5 < vars.item.severityCritical|int <= 5 %}{{"Criticality" | picklist("Low", "@id")}}{%elif 5 < vars.item.severityCritical|int <= 10 %}{{"Criticality" | picklist("Medium", "@id")}}{%elif 10 < vars.item.severityCritical|int <= 15 %}{{"Criticality" | picklist("High", "@id")}}{%elif 15 < vars.item.severityCritical|int <= 18 %}{{"Criticality" | picklist("Critical", "@id")}}{%elif vars.item.severityCritical|int > 18 %}{{"Criticality" | picklist("Very Critical", "@id")}}{% endif %}

workflows.name: > Create or Update Vulnerabilities
workflows.description: Creates new vulnerabilities and updates existing ones

routes.name: Compute Vulnerabilities List -> Create Vulnerabilities Records
Compute Remaining Vulnerabilities -> Set Status to Resolved
Set Status to Resolved -> Delete Resolved Vulnerabilities

groups.name: Confguration
groups.description:
- If delete_vulnerabilities variable is set to True, resolved vulnerabilities will be deleted from FortiSOAR. Else each fixes vulnerability status will be set to: 
- Resolved -

operations.title: List Completed Scans
operations.description: Provides all latest completed scans for given time duration

workflows.name: TenableSecurityCenter > Ingest
workflows.description: This playbook fetches scans assets and their associated vulnerabilities

steps.name: Create or Update Vulnerabilities in Batches

resource.name: {{vars.item.netbiosName}}
resource.criticality: {% if vars.item.severityCritical|int == 0 %}{{"Criticality" | picklist("None", "@id")}}{%elif 5 < vars.item.severityCritical|int <= 5 %}{{"Criticality" | picklist("Low", "@id")}}{%elif 5 < vars.item.severityCritical|int <= 10 %}{{"Criticality" | picklist("Medium", "@id")}}{%elif 10 < vars.item.severityCritical|int <= 15 %}{{"Criticality" | picklist("High", "@id")}}{%elif 15 < vars.item.severityCritical|int <= 18 %}{{"Criticality" | picklist("Critical", "@id")}}{%elif vars.item.severityCritical|int > 18 %}{{"Criticality" | picklist("Very Critical", "@id")}}{% endif %}

steps.name: Update Fetch from X Days Ago

routes.name: Create or Update Vulnerabilities in Batches -> Update Fetch from X Days Ago
Update Assets -> Create or Update Vulnerabilities in Batches

workflows.name: >> Create or Update Scans
workflows.description: Creates new scan and updates existing ones
